"【姉想いの弟】<br>仮テキスト": "<%me> and Quna, can you hear me?"
"It seems that just as planned the dragon is in the sphere arena."
"I don't know how long he'll remain there."
"It's okay, it's not likely that he'll move as long as there's music."
"That and one more thing, there's something that I wanted to inform the two of you of."
"It seems that other dragons have started going berserk. Apparently the reason for it may have something to do with Hadred."
"I'll start from my results. I found evidence of extremely inhumane experiments."
"It seems they were conducting experiments on a certain dragon, but were unable to stabilize it. The result being a rampage."
"They turned their focus to experimenting on humans, which in and of itself is pretty grave."
"As the experiments continues on humans and dragons, they continued to become even less humane."
"The details of the experiment were lost, but I think the outline provides enough information."
"But it seemed the experiment was a failure. Dragons went berserk, and humans cannot exceed their limits."
"But one incident occurred."
"An experiment that was supposed to be conducted on a human was carried out on a dragon, Hadred."

"The results of the experiment were that his power was unlocked,
following which, he went berserk and destroyed the facility."
"It was supposed to be conducted on people?"

"いえ、説明は不要です
六芒均衡カスラ。"

"わたしは知っている……いえ
聞いたことがある。覚えている。"

"研究室の崩壊……ハドレッドの暴走……
非人道的な人体実験……"
"ううん、そんなことはどうでもいい。"

"ハドレッドが……あいつが
わたしを守るために、己の身を
捨てたということを……！"

"そう……ですか。
では、奮戦を期待していますよ。"

"行きましょう
<%me>さん。
ハドレッドが待っています。"
